docs.snippet: Missouri Sen. Claire McCaskill was one of many Democrats taking umbrage Thursday at the revelation that Attorney General Jeff Sessions had twice met with the Russian ambassador to the U.S. during last year's presidential campaign, during a furor o...
docs.lead_paragraph: Missouri Sen. Claire McCaskill was one of many Democrats taking umbrage Thursday at the revelation that Attorney General Jeff Sessions had twice met with the Russian ambassador to the U.S. during last year's presidential campaign, during a furor over that country's alleged interference in the election, and misled his colleagues about it during his confirmation hearing.

headline.main: AP FACT CHECK: Democrat Forgets Her Own Russian Meetings
headline.print_headline: AP FACT CHECK: Democrat Forgets Her Own Russian Meetings
